tool_description:
For enterprise plans or customization contact admin@checkleaked.cc
Api for fetching YouTube subtitles
name: Subtitles for YouTube
title: Subtitles for YouTube

api_list.name: Get Summary

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: If you want to force either human generated subs or auto-generated ones use this param. By default if the query param is not provided then API will first try to find a human generated sub, on failing it will fall back to auto-generated sub

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Get subtitle in this language, if not specified default language of the video is picked. The languages codes can be retrieved using the List languages endpoint

optional_parameters.name: translated
optional_parameters.description: If subtitle is not present for a particular language, then we auto-translate it to the requested language. This behaviour can be disabled by passing translated=original, in that case if no subtitle is present in the requested language, nothing will be returned

api_list.name: Download mp3
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com/download_mp3/KvMY1uzSC1E"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com/download_mp3/{videoid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List all available subtitles
api_list.description: List all available subtitles for a YouTube video
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com/subtitles/hKmqP6-TcWA/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com/subtitles/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com/subtitles/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "subtitles-for-youtube2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Subtitle in JSON format
api_list.description: Get subtitle as a JSON object

optional_parameters.name: translated
optional_parameters.description: If subtitle is not present for a particular language, then we auto-translate it to the requested language. This behaviour can be disabled by passing translated=original, in that case if no subtitle is present in the requested language, nothing will be returned

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Get subtitle in this language, if not specified default language of the video is picked. The languages codes can be retrieved using the List languages endpoint

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: If you want to force either human generated subs or auto-generated ones use this param. By default if the query param is not provided then API will first try to find a human generated sub, on failing it will fall back to auto-generated sub

api_list.name: Get subtitle in SRT format

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: If you want to force either human generated subs or auto-generated ones use this param. By default if the query param is not provided then API will first try to find a human generated sub, on failing it will fall back to auto-generated sub

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Get subtitle in this language, if not specified default language of the video is picked. The languages codes can be retrieved using the List languages endpoint
